item.title: Lecture 01 - Course Introduction
item.description: Open on Key Topics Analysis development devtools Interactive maps leaflet R stlData Handouts Exercise - Email Exercise - Map Functions Leaflet As a way to get to know R and RStudio, weâ€™ll be working with the R package leaflet. leaflet is the R implementation of leaflet.js, an open-source Java Script library for building interactive maps.
